text: Sanyukt is an Indian Hindi family drama television series, which premiered on 6 September 2016 and is broadcast on Zee TV. The series is aired on weekday nights. The series is produced by Saregama Productions of Rahul Tewari. ==Plot== The story of the show is about an extended family and the triah ls and tribulations between each family member. ==Cast== * Shubhangi Latkar as Ila Mehta * Kiran Kumar as Govardhan Mehta * Maninder Singh as Rahul Mehta * Suraj Kakkar as Sameer Mehta * Harsh Vashisht as Parimal Mehta * Mohit Sharma as Niranjan Mehta * Simran Khanna as Tanuja Shah * Priyanka Purohit as Hetal Shah * Namrata Thapa as Gayatri Mehta * Urvashi Sharma as Rita Mehta * Sharad Joshi as Uday Mehta * Mahima Nayak as Prachi * Rishika Mihani as Maya ==References== Category:2016 Indian television series debuts Category:Hindi- language television shows Category:Indian television soap operas Category:Indian drama television series Category:Television shows set in Mumbai Category:Zee TV original programming
title: Sanyukt
